Player History
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to New York (A) on 4/9/1965 (Going to LAN: RF A. Shamsky. Going to NYA: CF M. Mantle)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1965, hitting .750 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 500th career homerun on 5/16/1965, off Dave Wickersham (KC1)...
Drove in 8 runs against Cleveland on 6/25/1965...
Was selected to the 1965 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/31/1965 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1965, hitting .435 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (A) on 5/26/1966...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Traded from New York (A) to Cincinnati on 7/4/1966 (Going to CIN: CF M. Mantle. Going to NYY: RF V. Pinson, C G. Tenace, 2B L. Boehmer, LF T. Harper)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Philadelphia on 8/29/1966...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1966...
Injured on 4/30/1967 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1967, hitting .481 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1967...
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 1/31/1968 (Going to CIN: 2B N. Miller, P M. Paul, P B. Humphreys. Going to DET: RF M. Mantle, P M. Cuellar)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1968, hitting .385 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1968, hitting .483 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 3000th career hit on 9/17/1969, off Moe Drabowsky (BAL)...
Drafted in 4th round, 68th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1973...
Released by Atlanta on 2/20/1980...
